definition: Actual practice is the sole criterion for judging truth (item from Deng Xiaoping theory, from 1978)
pinyin: shi2 jian4 shi4 jian3 yan4 zhen1 li3 de5 wei2 yi1 biao1 zhun3
traditional: 實踐是檢驗真理的唯一標準
word: 实践是检验真理的唯一标准

definition: variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)
to check/to examine/to inspect/to exercise restraint
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit

mark/sign/label/to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc/to bear (a brand name, registration number etc)/prize/award/bid/target/quota/(old) the topmost branches of a tree/visible symptom/classifier for military units
to allow/to grant/in accordance with/in the light of
practice/to put into practice/to live up to (a promise)/to carry out (a project)
Science and technology is the number one productive force (from 1978 speech by Deng Xiaoping 鄧小平|邓小平 introducing the Four Modernizations 四個現代化|四个现代化).
pinyin: ke1 xue2 ji4 shu4 shi4 di4 yi1 sheng1 chan3 li4
related.word: 科学技术是第一生产力

pinyin: shi4 shi2 sheng4 yu2 xiong2 bian4
bian4 zheng4 wei2 wu4 zhu3 yi4

definition: Take what you hear to be false, only believe it when you see it (idiom). Don't believe what people tell you until you see if for yourself./It ain't necessarily so.
pinyin: er3 ting1 wei2 xu1 , yan3 jian4 wei2 shi2

definition: lit. military tactics on paper (idiom)/fig. theoretical discussion that is worse than useless in practice/armchair strategist/idle theorizing/cf Zhao Kuo 趙括|赵括 leading an army of 400,000 to total annihilation at battle of Changping 長平之戰|长平之战 in 260 BC
to believe what one sees, not what one hears (idiom). Don't believe what people tell you until you see if for yourself./It ain't necessarily so.
pinyin: yan3 jian4 wei2 shi2 , er3 ting1 wei2 xu1

definition: to study sth to apply it/study for practical applications
dialectics/dialectic or Socratic method of debate

pinyin: zhen1 jin1 bu4 pa4 huo3 lian4
